name: Sidekick
tagline: A tool for automating some release management recurrent tasks at BM
body:
![Sidekick](https://raw.github.com/ikhemissi/sidekick/master/public/images/logo_64.png) Sidekick [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ikhemissi/sidekick.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/ikhemissi/sidekick)
========

Sidekick is a tool for automating release management tasks at BM from tickets and planning to deployment.
